Contact Us
We can provide the perfect venue for your wedding or event in North Florida.
We’re happy to help, and we always strive to respond quickly.
Please feel free to call or send a message to
(904) 705-0780
or send email to
cbarranchevents@gmail.com
We’re located at:
22889 N. State Road 121
Alachua, FL 32615
Conveniently located a few minutes east of Interstate 75 between Lake City and Gainesville,
and just southwest of Jacksonville.
C Bar Ranch

Wedding Packages
Private ranch access — just you two and your guests!
We designed our beautiful barn to be a magical place where rustic meets elegant. Glam it up or dress it down. The choice is yours. We want you to thoroughly enjoy every moment of your Wedding Weekend. So we devote ourselves to just one wedding a week. Yours!
So go ahead. Decorate, relax, rehearse, celebrate. Hang out around the fire pit under the market lights, and enjoy a laid-back rehearsal dinner, if you choose. Dance the night away after your ceremony. Come early. Stay late.
It’s YOUR party barn.
Enjoy!
Event Packages
Corporate Events and Milestone Celebrations
Starting at $3,000
Tables and chairs (Setup/breakdown by C Bar)
Use of decor collection
Tablecloths available
Up to 220 guests
Yard games
Audio/visual system
Large, well-equipped kitchen
Commercial ice machine
Many more ranch amenities
Elegance Wedding Package
$6,500
4 hours of private access on Rehearsal Day
14 hours of private access on Wedding Day
Up to 200 guests
Tables and chairs (Setup/breakdown by C Bar)
Use of expansive decor collection
Yard games and personalized cornhole
Audio/visual system
Large, well-equipped kitchen
Commercial ice machine
Many more ranch amenities
Elegance-Plus Wedding Package
$7,500
12 hours of private access on Rehearsal Day
Rehearsal dinner setup of tables and chairs
16 hours of private access on Wedding Day
4 hours of private access on the day after
Floor-length tablecloths for the reception
Personalized welcome sign at ranch entrance
Up to 200 guests
Tables and chairs (Setup/breakdown by C Bar)
Use of expansive decor collection
Yard games and personalized cornhole
Audio/visual system
Large, well-equipped kitchen
Commercial ice machine
Many more ranch amenities
Date-hold deposit varies by package.
Remaining balance due one month before event.
Credit cards accepted.
Special discounts available. Book a tour to discuss!
Download Our Rate Sheet
Both Elegance and Elegance-Plus wedding packages have use of these C Bar Ranch amenities:
Stately, air-conditioned party barn.
Luxurious Bride’s Suite with private bathroom, smart TV, comfortable furniture, mini bar,
coffee bar, mirrored dressing area and hair/make-up stations with salon chairs.
Groom’s Room with smart TV, DVD player and movies, gaming console, comfortable furniture,
dressing area, private bathroom and mini bar.
Fully equipped warming kitchen with commercial refrigerator, two ovens, ample workspace,
three-compartment sink, plating tables, commercial ice maker — yep, it’s the good ice! — and more.
Audio/visual system with two, 55-inch HD televisions in the main room and wireless, smart microphone for slideshows and announcements.
Use of C Bar Ranch decor.
Use of yard games, such as corn hole (personalized for you), Giant Jenga, Giant Connect Four.
Use of farm-style sweetheart table; 22, five-foot-diameter, round tables; a 36-inch cake table; 14 eight-foot, rectangular tables; six, six-foot, rectangular tables; five cocktail tables; 375 white, wedding chairs for indoor and outdoor seating.
Indoor and outdoor photo balconies.
Expansive dance floor lighted by chandeliers.
ADA-accessible bathrooms for men and women, and separate ladies’ lounge.
Porches with lights and ceiling fans.
Oak patio with fire-pit gathering spot, market lights and uplighting on trees.
Choice of multiple ceremony sites, including on a dock at our pond.
Set-up and breakdown of your customized cocktail/social hour and reception tables and chairs by C Bar staff.
On-site representative during your event, who will monitor cleanliness of facilities, replenish restroom items, and handle any client concerns that may arise.
Full set-up and breakdown of your custom ceremony design and reception layout. No clean-up for you!
Availability for engagement photo shoot at the ranch. Bring your photographer and make these once-in-a-lifetime photos beautiful and unique.
See Our Photos,
Videos and Reviews!

ranch looks throughout the year
and choose the best month for your wedding style or event vibe.

C Bar Ranch and Organics

Santiago Rivera Santana
2025-02-05
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Excelent!
R-CONTENT
Hannah Moses
2025-01-27
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
C Bar Ranch was hands down the most accommodating, convenient, and enjoyable venue we could've chosen for our wedding. The owners are hospitable beyond expectation and communicate quickly and efficiently. We couldn't have been happier with our experience throughout the planning and of course, the day of. We would recommend anyone considering a venue to get married at C Bar Ranch! :)
R-CONTENT
Jorie Rottman
2025-01-24
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
This venue is perfect! It had almost everything we needed (signs, décor, tables, chairs, ceremony arch, etc) which is extremely helpful. The owners went above and beyond to make sure the planning process and day of went smoothly. I scheduled multiple meetings (too many) at the venue to meet with vendors and so my mom and I could plan. They were very accommodating and put my nerves at ease. The day of rained but they remained calm and positive. The sun ended up coming out right before the ceremony and they wiped everything down and got it all set up so we could have it outside as planned. The barn is very well kept, has great space for both bridal parties/guests and the beautiful grounds had multiple locations for photo opportunities. We cannot thank Ray and Nanette enough for making our day so memorable. I would highly recommend!

Wedding was on 3/2/24 for photos.
R-CONTENT
Corey Short
2024-11-19
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
R-CONTENT
His Wife
2024-11-12
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
This place is absolutely beautiful
R-CONTENT
Kathleen Davis
2024-10-08
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
C Bar did such an AMAZING job with our wedding. Nanette and Ray go above and beyond to provide a wonderful experience. Ray was onsite the entire day taking care of every need. We unfortunately got married right after the passing of Hurricane Helene and they made sure our day could still happen as scheduled. Not to mention the property is gorgeous and the inside of the barn is perfect for whatever kind of reception you are envisioning.
Being able to get ready AT the venue was an enormous plus as well. Could not recommend them enough. Pics are from our original tour (already gorgeous without any decorations!)
R-CONTENT
Emma Minck
2024-09-27
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
It was a joy to return to celebrate one year since my husband proposed at C Bar Ranch. The venue was as beautiful as ever and such a peaceful and pretty spot to have a little picnic to celebrate. So very thankful for the kindness of the owners!
R-CONTENT
Irum Aamir
2024-05-07
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Very nice
R-CONTENT
Kelly Gordon
2024-04-15
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
We LOVED having our wedding at C Bar Ranch! It is such a beautiful place! Ray and Nanette were so helpful and our wedding was just beautiful! Especially with our wedding being in April the flowers were blooming along the brick walkway near the pond and the barn is just so grand and pretty. Our day went so smooth and we are so happy we picked C Bar Ranch!
R-CONTENT
Josh Haltam
2024-04-08
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
From the start, we have loved Ray & Nanette. What they have built together at C Bar is absolutely beautiful, and more importantly who they are together is why we adore them. We're currently in year 14 of photographing weddings, and they are high up on our list of favorites. Your dream day will be just that. Thank you for the open arms toward us and all your couples!
R-CONTENT

We’re happy to help, and we always strive to respond quickly.

C Bar Ranch
Contact Us
We can provide the perfect venue for your wedding or event in North Florida.
We’re happy to help, and we always strive to respond quickly.
Please feel free to call or send a message to
(904) 705-0780
or send email to
cbarranchevents@gmail.com
We’re located at:
22889 N. State Road 121
Alachua, FL 32615
Conveniently located a few minutes east of Interstate 75 between Lake City and Gainesville,
and just southwest of Jacksonville.

C Bar Ranch has a story that spans generations, with a rich history of turpentine production, cattle ranching and crops.  Now, with our luxury events barn built for the purpose, the ranch is the perfect venue for weddings and events in Florida.
C Bar Ranch and Organics, LLC is a family-owned-and-operated farm and events venue. We are the fourth and fifth generation to work this land.
Many years ago, the pine forests of the property were used for the collection of tree sap that was transformed by State Rep. Jasper Harris into turpentine for waterproofing ships.
The land was later farmed and ranched by his daughter, Dorothy, and her husband, Roy Cellon. They produced cattle and vegetables, often growing potatoes for what was then called the Wise Potato Chip Co.
Now, ranch operations are run by their granddaughter, her husband, and their children. Their mission is to produce fresh, healthy vegetables and fruits in a variety of sustainable and eco-friendly ways and humanely raise animals the way God intended. They aim to preserve the ranch and its bountiful natural resources for many future generations to enjoy.
In 2017, the events venue was added to the property. Now, the family invites in others to enjoy a taste of rural life and all its beauty.
Ray Holt, the farm manager, would be proud to show you around and help you plan the perfect event.
The farm, with its sprawling oaks and charming barn, provides the perfect backdrop of natural beauty for a wide range of events—from elegant weddings to corporate events, quinceañeras, and much more.
C Bar Ranch was named for the livestock brand of Roy and Dorothy Cellon, which appeared as a capital C with an underscore.
Why we do what we do
Ray and Nanette were married in 1997 and enjoyed their own wedding tremendously. Looking back on the day spent surrounded by loved ones gives them great joy even now. Their hope is to help you create memories that will bring you the same kind of joy as you launch your life together.
By building an elegant wedding and events venue, they’ve provided a way for the land to remain in an agricultural use and allow their adult children and future grandchildren to continue working together to  preserve the ranch.
Join the C Bar family
We look forward to hearing how we can help make your day just as you’ve dreamed it would be. Even better, actually! We take that responsibility very seriously. To us, our couples are family.
We strive to have unequaled customer service. If you have special requests, please let us know. We want to say yes!
We truly believe what our clients routinely say—that C Bar Ranch is the best Florida wedding venue and the best place to host special events.
To schedule a tour, call or text
(904) 705-0780
today or shoot an email to
CBarRanchEvents@gmail.com
. We’ll be glad to check to see if we have your date available.
Unique Celebrations Are Our Speciality
